name: @justsml/easy-proxy
description: Simple streaming proxy service. Features basic authentication, easy configuration and clear code.

scripts.docker:start: docker run --name easy-proxy --rm -p 5050:5050 -e PORT=5050 -e PROXY_USERNAME=$PROXY_USERNAME -e PROXY_PASSWORD=$PROXY_PASSWORD justsml/easy-proxy
scripts.docker:service: docker run --daemon --rm --name easy-proxy -d -p 5050:5050 -e PORT=5050 -e PROXY_USERNAME=$PROXY_USERNAME -e PROXY_PASSWORD=$PROXY_PASSWORD justsml/easy-proxy
